name: Toy: Defensive Tactics
description:
Toy: Defensive Tactics

Hello everyone, my name is Alejandro Valera, I am an independent developer and I have come to show you a demo of my next project called Toy: Defense Tacti.

Description

Title is a fast-paced, fast-paced tower defense-style strategy game where you must protect the base from waves of wicked toys, cutting off their progress with turrets and using interactive objects to delay or eliminate your enemies.

In the demo you can find the following:

Turrets: 4 types of turrets to choose from, two lacer and two cannons, at first you will only have access to two of them and while passing the levels the next one will be unlocked.

Enemies: there are 4 types of enemies and a final boss.

Interactive objects: on the stage you will find several types of interactive objects which are activated at certain times, these objects can consume energy and some are single use, so we use it wisely.
